title: Analysis of the Association Between Regularity of Pre-Learning Activities and Learning Outcomes in Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of flipped learning basics and experience utilizing online learning tools
context.additional_context: Mandatory pre-session online learning activities (video viewing, quizzes, discussion board participation, etc.) before in-person sessions

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of regularity in pre-learning activities and time management strategies on learning outcomes in flipped learning
Learners can derive two or more types of pre-learning engagement patterns (general/design-specific indicators) by analyzing learning tracking data
Learners can visualize and report the correlation between regularity indicators and academic performance using regression prediction models
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
